pullrequest.title: Kill rogue gzservers left over from failed INTEGRATION_world_clone tests (#1299)

content.raw: Just a note: obviously if the test is invoked direcatly through the binary (`./test/integration/INTEGRATION_world_clone`) our clean up is not going to work. But that's not under the scope of this request.
content.html: Just a note: obviously if the test is invoked direcatly through the binary (./test/integration/INTEGRATION_world_clone) our clean up is not going to work. But that's not under the scope of this request.
